channel.title: You are banned from this server
channel.description: Im asasineblade on the server... and im banned?? I did go bed.. i wasnt i woked up ( now ) and i tryed to log in and im banned well ...

item.title: You are banned from this server
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:29, topic:385639”][quote author=Vic_ link=topic=481391.msg3525488#msg3525488 date=1299780301]
You ban people for placing signs on a game saying that they built some virtual house made out of blocks? That’s awesome. I lol’d.
[/quote]What? This has nothing to do with signs.

Here’s the story:

There was a report of some major griefing at coles place that he shares with someone else (for the life of me I can’t remember who) and he asked me to teleport to him to fix it (and in turn see who did it)

I obliged; and like he said, it was pretty bad. I pulled out my trusty stick (which is the tool I use to check the logs) and went around right clicking destroyed blocks. They were ALL from you ‘[Time/Date] asaineblade destroyed block COBBLESTONE’ etc. I also checked your IP, it matched all previous IP’s you had used, so it wasn’t some random person on your account. This is good enough proof - so I used my rollback command to rollback an amazing 2000+ changes you had made, then banned you.

Just because you know nobody was there, doesn’t mean we have no proof.

Big Brother is always watching.[/quote]that’s a great plugin!

so asasine you just got owned

Read full topic
item.source: You are banned from this server

item.title: You are banned from this server
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Vic_, post:27, topic:385639”]You ban people for placing signs on a game saying that they built some virtual house made out of blocks? That’s awesome. I lol’d.[/quote]What? This has nothing to do with signs.

Here’s the story:

There was a report of some major griefing at coles place that he shares with someone else (for the life of me I can’t remember who) and he asked me to teleport to him to fix it (and in turn see who did it)

I obliged; and like he said, it was pretty bad. I pulled out my trusty stick (which is the tool I use to check the logs) and went around right clicking destroyed blocks. They were ALL from you ‘[Time/Date] asaineblade destroyed block COBBLESTONE’ etc. I also checked your IP, it matched all previous IP’s you had used, so it wasn’t some random person on your account. This is good enough proof - so I used my rollback command to rollback an amazing 2000+ changes you had made, then banned you.

Just because you know nobody was there, doesn’t mean we have no proof.

Big Brother is always watching.

Read full topic

item.title: You are banned from this server
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:25, topic:385639”][quote author=asasineblade link=topic=481391.msg3525456#msg3525456 date=1299774167]

i dont think he did this, cuz my brother logged into my minecraft account and changed a sign to “gg fagget” or somthing
PS: Iam ip banned too

Well i idk but I DIDNT GRIEF

The logs tells Davidi2 exactly who did what, and possibly even when. You may not beleive it but oh well. Your user was the last one to touch something there, and he ip banned that user. Your ip happened to come up. Tuff shit and deal with your/brothers actions. (its always the brother in these situations)

Well, i asked david to show me the proofs, if he dont he aint has the fuckcing proof
[/quote]
MITB has the server, not Davidi2, the only way Davidi2 can get you proof is if MITB posted it. The moment you were ip banned it undoes everything you did.[/quote]

No, Davidi2 has full access to all username/IP logs, as well as he can get on the server and see the full history change for each block.

Read full topic

item.title: You are banned from this server
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“asasineblade, post:19, topic:385639”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=481391.msg3525342#msg3525342 date=1299761217]

Probably not permanent, just realize that we can easily detect greifing, and roll back any changes you make with one command. If you get caught again obviously it will be perm.

Pm me in about 2 weeks probably

Okay,i will.

I’m pretty sure you were placing signs around my castle claiming it, along with “gg fag”.

wowow that wasnt me i was busy searchin a good place to build me fort… Ask andrew i has me fort next to his sky garden but fuck it ya guys dont believe me so why am i even replying

They clearly have proof. You’re a terrible liar, so shut up. And tell me to ask someone that I can trust, how about?
[/quote]

K let me see the proof. I wanna see that fucking proof, though someone could have logged into my account(s)? well show the fucking proof.

EDIT: on your pictures it says fam1s house… well im aint fam1s[/quote]
Fixed.
You’re trying to intimidate me, and it’s not working. And “someone else was on my account” is one of the worst excuses ever, almost as bad as “my brother registered on this comp and did bad stuff plzz unban my ip”.
Also, asasine isn’t a word.
And Davidi2 says you were griefing me, and the only griefing I spotted was done by fame1, and David has a plugin that can check who damaged what.
Ask him for the proof.

Read full topic
item.source: You are banned from this server
